query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN iataCode IN ('MLE', 'GAN', 'NMF', 'HAQ', 'VAM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as international,
       SUM(CASE WHEN iataCode NOT IN ('MLE', 'GAN', 'NMF', 'HAQ', 'VAM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as domestic
FROM airports;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN iataCode IN ('MLE', 'GAN', 'NMF', 'HAQ', 'VAM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as international,
       SUM(CASE WHEN iataCode NOT IN ('MLE', 'GAN', 'NMF', 'HAQ', 'VAM') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as domestic
FROM airports;
